hints.content: Start by understanding the flow of the pillow passing. The pillow starts with person 1 and moves to person 2, then to person 3, and so on until it reaches person n. After that, it reverses direction.
Consider how the pillow's position changes over time. For the first n seconds, the pillow will simply move to the next person in line. After reaching person n, it will start moving back to person 1.
Think about how many complete cycles the pillow makes. A full cycle consists of passing the pillow from person 1 to person n and back to person 1, which takes 2n - 2 seconds.
To find the effective time after accounting for full cycles, you can use the modulo operation. Calculate `time % (2 * (n - 1))` to determine how many seconds are left after completing full cycles.

After calculating the effective time, consider two cases: if the effective time is less than n, the pillow is still moving forward. If it is greater than or equal to n, the pillow has started moving backward.

If the effective time is less than n, the position can be directly calculated as `position = effective_time + 1` since it starts from person 1. For example, if effective_time is 3, the pillow is with person 4.

If the effective time is greater than or equal to n, you need to calculate how far back the pillow has moved. The formula for the backward movement is `position = n - (effective_time - n)`, which accounts for the reverse direction.
Make sure to handle the edge cases where n is the minimum value (2). This will ensure your solution is robust against the smallest inputs.
Consider the constraints provided in the problem. Ensure your solution works efficiently within the limits of 2 <= n <= 1000 and 1 <= time <= 1000.
Combine all your findings into a single function. Start by calculating the effective time, then determine the position based on whether the pillow is moving forward or backward.

questionNotes: The pillow starts with person 1 and moves to person n before reversing direction.
Return the index of the person holding the pillow after the specified time.
